+     // ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«æ•°ãŒå°‘ãªã„å ´åˆã¯è©•ä¾¡ã‚’è¡Œã‚ãªã„ï¼ˆ10ä»¶æœªæº€ï¼‰
+     if (values.length < 10) {
+       return {
+         label: null,
+         color: "text-gray-500"
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     // çµ±è¨ˆå€¤ã®è¨ˆç®—
+     const calculateStats = (data: number[]) => {
+       // å¤–ã‚Œå€¤ã®é™¤å¤–ã®ãŸã‚ã«ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒˆã™ã‚‹
+       const sortedData = [...data].sort((a, b) => a - b);
+       
+       // ä¸Šä½ä¸‹ä½1%ã‚’é™¤å¤–ï¼ˆãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿æ•°ãŒ100æœªæº€ã®å ´åˆã¯é™¤å¤–ã—ãªã„ï¼‰
+       const trimmedData = data.length >= 100 
+         ? sortedData.slice(Math.floor(data.length * 0.01), Math.ceil(data.length * 0.99))
+         : sortedData;
+       
+       // å¹³å‡å€¤ã®è¨ˆç®—
+       const mean = trimmedData.reduce((sum, val) => sum + val, 0) / trimmedData.length;
+       
+       // æ¨™æº–åå·®ã®è¨ˆç®—
+       const variance = trimmedData.reduce((sum, val) => sum + Math.pow(val - mean, 2), 0) / trimmedData.length;
+       const stdDev = Math.sqrt(variance);
+       
+       return { mean, stdDev };
+     };
+     
+     // çµ±è¨ˆå€¤ã®è¨ˆç®—
+     const { mean, stdDev } = calculateStats(values);
+     
+     // æ¨™æº–åŒ–ã•ã‚ŒãŸzå€¤ã‚’è¨ˆç®—ï¼ˆå¹³å‡ã‹ã‚‰ã®æ¨™æº–åå·®æ•°ï¼‰
+     const zScore = (value - mean) / stdDev;
+     
+     // zå€¤ã«åŸºã¥ã„ã¦è©•ä¾¡ã‚’æ±ºå®š
+     const labels = ["ä½ã‚", "ã‚„ã‚„ä½ã‚", "å¹³å‡çš„", "ã‚„ã‚„é«˜ã‚", "é«˜ã‚"];
+     const colors = ["text-red-500", "text-orange-500", "text-yellow-500", "text-green-500", "text-emerald-500"];
+     
+     let labelIndex: number;
+     
+     if (zScore < -2) {
+       labelIndex = 0; // ä½ã‚
+     } else if (zScore < -1) {
+       labelIndex = 1; // ã‚„ã‚„ä½ã‚
+     } else if (zScore < 1) {
+       labelIndex = 2; // å¹³å‡çš„
+     } else if (zScore < 2) {
+       labelIndex = 3; // ã‚„ã‚„é«˜ã‚
+     } else {
+       labelIndex = 4; // é«˜ã‚
      }
      
      return {
-       label: labels[Math.min(index, labels.length - 1)],
-       color: colors[Math.min(index, colors.length - 1)]
-     }
-   }
+       label: labels[labelIndex],
+       color: colors[labelIndex]
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è©•ä¾¡ã«å¿…è¦ãªå€¤ã®é…åˆ—ã‚’å–å¾—
+   const getValuesArray = (videos: Video[], valueExtractor: (video: Video) => number) => {
+     return videos.map(valueExtractor);
+   };
+   
+   // å„æŒ‡æ¨™ã®å€¤ã®é…åˆ—
+   const viewsValues = getValuesArray(videos, video => 
+     Number.parseInt(video.viewCount.replace(/,/g, ""), 10)
+   );
+   
+   const likesValues = getValuesArray(videos, video => 
+     Number.parseInt(video.likeCount.replace(/,/g, ""), 10)
+   );
+   
+   const commentsValues = getValuesArray(videos, video => 
+     Number.parseInt(video.commentCount.replace(/,/g, ""), 10)
+   );
+   
+   const spreadValues = getValuesArray(videos, video => video.spreadRate);
    
    // å†ç”Ÿæ•°ã®è©•ä¾¡
-   const viewsRating = getPerformanceRating(avgViews, 'views')
+   const viewsRating = getPerformanceRating(avgViews, 'views', viewsValues);
    // é«˜è©•ä¾¡ã®è©•ä¾¡
-   const likesRating = getPerformanceRating(avgLikes, 'likes')
+   const likesRating = getPerformanceRating(avgLikes, 'likes', likesValues);
    // ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆæ•°ã®è©•ä¾¡
-   const commentsRating = getPerformanceRating(avgComments, 'comments')
+   const commentsRating = getPerformanceRating(avgComments, 'comments', commentsValues);
    // ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ç‡ã®è©•ä¾¡
-   const spreadRating = getPerformanceRating(avgSpreadRate, 'spread')
+   const spreadRating = getPerformanceRating(avgSpreadRate, 'spread', spreadValues);
  
    return (
                  <CardContent>
                    <div className="text-2xl font-bold">{formatNumber(avgViews.toString())}</div>
+                   {viewsRating.label ? (
                      <div className={`text-xs mt-1 ${viewsRating.color}`}>{viewsRating.label}</div>
+                   ) : null}
                    <div className="h-1 w-full bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-full mt-2">
                      <div className="h-1 bg-blue-500 rounded-full" style={{ width: `${Math.min(100, avgViews / 1000)}%` }}></div>
                  <CardContent>
                    <div className="text-2xl font-bold">{formatNumber(avgLikes.toString())}</div>
+                   {likesRating.label ? (
                      <div className={`text-xs mt-1 ${likesRating.color}`}>{likesRating.label}</div>
+                   ) : null}
                    <div className="h-1 w-full bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-full mt-2">
                      <div className="h-1 bg-teal-500 rounded-full" style={{ width: `${Math.min(100, avgLikes / 100)}%` }}></div>
                  <CardContent>
                    <div className="text-2xl font-bold">{formatNumber(avgComments.toString())}</div>
+                   {commentsRating.label ? (
                      <div className={`text-xs mt-1 ${commentsRating.color}`}>{commentsRating.label}</div>
+                   ) : null}
                    <div className="h-1 w-full bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-full mt-2">
                      <div className="h-1 bg-amber-500 rounded-full" style={{ width: `${Math.min(100, avgComments / 10)}%` }}></div>
